name: dirt-backend
description: Backend WebSocket server for the DIRT Unraid plugin.

scripts.stop: ps aux | grep 'dirt.js' | grep -v grep | awk '{print $2}' | xargs kill -9
scripts.restart: npm run stop && npm run start
scripts.prep: npm install && playwright install && npm run seed
scripts.test: npm run clean && npm run unraid-workaround && npm run start && pytest && npm run stop
